metadata.name: Phoenix Token
metadata.description:
Phoenix Tokens are fractions of the Genesis TBFC (Phoenix). Owners of the Phoenix Tokens can participate in collective governance over Phoenixâ€™s character arc, allocation of funds, framing of rules and partnerships. The ultimate goal is to have a fully decentralised governance of IP and hand the Phoenix IP to the community.
Visit https://tokenize-xchange.gitbook.io/tbot-fight-club-tbfc/fractionalisation-of-phoenix for more details.
